task.title: Sending an announcement
task.shortdesc: You can send a message to all the online members of a group simultaneously.

context.p: Recipients get the announcement as a pop-up alert on their clients unless you allow the recipients to respond to the message. In this case, a chat window opens in each recipient's Sametime window

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Contacts.
Click the menu icon next to the contact or group name to send a message and click Send Announcement.
In the Send Announcement dialogue box, type the message.Is there a restriction on size?
To add additional people to the announcement, type a name in the Search for Recipients. As you type suggestions are provided. Click a name to add to the send list.
step.info: To remove a recipient, click the delete icon (.
